Plot metric samples

Source: R/metrics.R
plot_metric.Rd

Plot metric samples

Usage

plot_metric(x, metric_name = "Network Metric", ...)

Arguments

x

Network metric samples object

metric_name

Metric name to use for plot axis label

...

Additional parameters to be passed to plot function
